snippet.title: The Joy of Sets
snippet.description: What if you sent a writer overseas and told him to go to as many movie sets as humanly possible in a week? Would he chat up Cate Blanchett and see Brad Pitt fight in World War II? Would he get cast in a musical? Would he eat an ungodly amount of catering? Yes, to all of the above

snippet.title: 11 Landmark Movies...for Monumental Destruction
snippet.description: ''White House Down'' director Roland Emmerich isn't the only filmmaker with an appetite for destruction. We tallied up films and franchises with the most carnage (bonus points to older monuments, Wonders of the World, and anything touched by the hand of Emmerich).
